Retrieves an user details based on the token.
Checks the number of credit that the user can still use.
Retrieves the city details by postal code.

value.caen: 4711 - Retail trade in non-specialized stores, mainly selling food, beverages and tobacco
value.address: Loc. Târgu Lăpuş, Oraş Târgu Lăpuş, Str. TINERETULUI, Nr. 10, Județ Maramureş, Cod poștal 435600

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

cui = "YOUR_CUI_HERE"
currency = "YOUR_CURRENCY_HERE" # Default: RON

response = requests.get(f"https://app.metricbiz.com/v1/api//companies/{cui}", params={"currency": currency})

data = response.json()
print(data)
